reviewText:
An enjoyable look back at a different era of college basketball. Without a shot clock or three-point line, these teams put on a performance that put today's game to shame. They ran up and down the court all game long because it was the style of game that they played. And no trashtalking! Excellent!
The picture quality was very good until approximately the ten minute mark of the second half. At that point, a sort of "rolling strobe" started that continued through the game's conclusion. It gets quite annoying. Ruining what, otherwise, had been close to perfection. That's why the four.
